lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Coughlin relieved offensive coordinator John Hufnagel of his play-calling duties on Tuesday, four days before the Giants play the Washington Redskins for a chance to make the playoffs.
snippet: Coach Tom Coughlin relieved offensive coordinator John Hufnagel of his play-calling duties on Tuesday, four days before the Giants play the Washington Redskins for a chance to make the playoffs.
